member.name: T:SqlServerTypes.Utilities
member.summary: Utility methods related to CLR Types for SQL Server

member.name: M:SqlServerTypes.Utilities.LoadNativeAssemblies(System.String)
member.summary: Loads the required native assemblies for the current architecture (x86 or x64)
member.param: Root path of the current application. Use Server.MapPath(".") for ASP.NET applications and AppDomain.CurrentDomain.BaseDirectory for desktop applications.
